item.title: Egypt 2020-05-07
item.description: Contents Ahram Al-Masry Al-Youm Al-Youm Al-Sabe’ Mada Masr Ahram Rami Makhlouf What is the reason behind the public dispute between Makhlouf and Assad? It is said that the Russians are pressuring Assad to pay for the costs of the Russian protection of Syria, which is leading Assad to pressure his businessmen, such as Makhlouf, to provide the regime with funding. Other causes are suggested, mainly that there is a dispute between Makhlouf and Asma’ Al-Assad or that because Makhlouf is an Alawite, he may be trying to become the president.

Contents Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Al-Jazeera Al-Arabiya Sky News Arabia Al-Sharq Al-Awsat Al-Araby Al-Jadeed Corona Egypt: Doubts about the efficiency of the return-to-work plans The Egyptian government continues to rush towards a full return to service and financial activities after the end of the month of Ramadan, despite the worsening situation of the new Corona epidemic, the steady increase in the number of daily casualties… and the failure of the state to conduct random tests even in areas that witnessed high infection rates.
